links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
mathematica: f[n_] := Quotient[ n!, 10^Floor@ Log[10, n!]]; Array[ f, 105, 0]
author: _Russ Cox_
